Frank - I'd hate to see you go, YOUR work / your recordings ARE the ONly on=
es that really interest me.
Its your work that has really made me sit up an=
d take notice.  I wish you the best [whatever you decide to do}
Thanx for o=
pening my eyes and ears.

Ken

  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: Kris=
tin Morris 
  To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Wednesday, December 12, =
2007 2:27 PM
  Subject: RE: [EVP-ITC] Afeter a long discussion...



  WOW =
Frank.  I'm so sorry you have to go through all this.  I know many people r=
espect you for all that you have done and continue to do!  I wish I could d=
o or say something to make it all stop but I can't.  My only advise - Do wh=
at you love and *%#* the rest.

  Huge hugs from Texas!  

  k




--------=
----------------------------------------------------------------------

  F=
rom: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com [mailto:EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com] On Behalf Of =
Frank Sumption
  Sent: Wednesday, December 12, 2007 2:23 PM
  To: Group
  S=
ubject: [EVP-ITC] Afeter a long discussion...



   After a long discussion=
, and at times a yelling match with Chris Moon on the phone...I have like z=
ero memory for verbal stuff, basically I think it came down to he said-she =
said type deal. I could agree with some of what Mr Moon said, but the botto=
m line is--I don't care! I have had enough of these endless pissing contest=
s, one person telling me one thing, someone else telling me something else.=
 I'm not wise enough to tell who is telling the truth. I'm done, I'm not di=
scussing this stuff anymore, I'm not making boxes anymore. I have absolutel=
y no interest in the so called paranormal. I don't sell this shit, I don't =
make any money, all it does eat all my time and piss me off. I'll finish th=
is last box I'm working on, and that's it. No more e-mails, no more discuss=
ion--I have had it!
   
   Mr Moon said he would be glad to come on the gro=
up and answer question--so there ya go, now is your chance. I'm not going t=
o be the go between, nor will I participate. 
   
   Frank-S


------------=
------------------------------------------------------------------

  Don't=
 get caught with egg on your face. Play Chicktionary! Check it out!
